name: Super Hyper Extreme Pizza Force 2
description:
After the battle against the previous foe, a new enemy arrives. This new foe has sent his radical skateboarding turtles to take over the world. It is up to the chosen pizza pie to protect the world once again.

To play this game, you will need to have an XBox One controller. You can also use the keyboard if you do not have a XBox One controller.

The screen may cut off portions of the game. I am currently trying to figure out this is happening with unity.

Note: This game is a work in progress and is in an early stage of development.
